Entry.JapaneseText: なんだ、あの山……？ 角が二本生えてるみたいな……
Entry.EnglishText: What's up with that mountain...? It's like it has two horns sticking out of it...

Entry.JapaneseText: あれは獣王山だ。カレギアの初代国王ゴルドバに ちなんでそう名づけられたという。
Entry.EnglishText: That's Mount Sovereign. It is said to have been named after Callegea's first king, Goldba.

Entry.JapaneseText: へぇ……よく折れないな、アレ。
Entry.EnglishText: Wow... I'm surprised those things haven't broken off...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何か不思議な力に護られている という言い伝えもある。
Entry.EnglishText: There is a legend that a mysterious power protects them.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何しろ、この国にとっても、 王家にとっても聖なる場所だというからな。
Entry.EnglishText: Anyway, it is regarded as a sacred place for both this Kingdom and its royal family.
